definition: Comments about how clearly the instructor explained course material and organized the course structure.
Comments reflecting the professor's attitude, personality, and interaction with students.
Comments related to the perceived difficulty of the course material and assessments.
Comments about the level of student involvement and participation encouraged in the class.
Comments on how well the instructor and TAs responded to student feedback and questions.
Comments on the integration and effectiveness of technology and online resources in the course.
Comments regarding the fairness, clarity, and structure of grading and assessments.
Comments about the relevance and applicability of the course content to real-world scenarios.
Comments on the amount of work required and the ability to manage time effectively in the course.
Comments on the integration of spiritual or ethical elements into the course.
